Author: pg
Content: My god, is that site cluttered with ads.  Looks like a site from 1997.  There was no "print friendly" (i.e. human friendly) link either.  I just gave up.

Author: e1ven
Title: Sun releases Game Platform as OSS

Author: domp
Content: I have found that having a cofounder makes the process a little more easier. I tend to become more motivated when I feel that someone else is also dedicated to the cause. I think it is essential for killing bad ideas and thinking more creatively too. We come up with better ideas together than we do on our own. I know I have bad ideas sometimes but without that  input from someone also involved in the company I find that the feedback I get isn't as beneficial.\n
